recipesJson.name: Frosted Tourmaline Sky - Week 1
recipesJson.author: JenniferJarvis
recipesJson.description: Week 1 of The Year Of Mixing - Inspiration picture used for the thumbnail.  The aurora in the night sky against the white cold snow covered ground inspired this recipe completely.  Nice cold frosty bite with the strawberry and watermelon notes dusted with a sweetness of powdered sugar and a dash of cap super sweet. If you'd like to participate in the Year of Mixing find the Flavor-Pro group and join us for our weekly challenge - all mixers welcome - and there will be some prizes.  You can find more information here http://flavor-pro.com/the-year-of-mixing/

reviews.text: Very nice, refreshing vape.  I vape menthols on my commute to reset the taste buds and this will be in my rotation.  Many thanks.
